settings.text: We offer clear warranty and assistance options. Buy with confidence.

At Outexer, we believe that peace of mind is an important part of a great sauna experience. That’s why every sauna we build is backed by a solid warranty and responsive technical support to provide lasting confidence in your wellness journey.

5-Year Limited Warranty

Every Outexer sauna comes with a 5-year limited warranty that covers defects in materials and workmanship under normal home use.

This warranty includes:

  • Structural Coverage
    Warranty against warping, cracking, or other damage to the sauna frame and wood panels caused by manufacturing defects.
  • Electrical Components
    Warranty against failures of heating plates, LED lighting, wiring, and digital control panels.
  • Heating Performance
    Ensures your sauna maintains proper heating function and meets safety standards.

If any problem covered by this warranty occurs, we will repair or replace the affected parts free of charge during the warranty period.

Exclusions & User-Caused Damage

Please note that this warranty does not cover damage caused by misuse, improper installation, or accidental damage during personal use. Damage caused by user negligence (such as damaged components, exposed wiring, or cracked panels due to improper operation) is not covered by our free warranty.

If you need to replace parts due to personal damage, please feel free to contact us. We will be happy to assist you in purchasing replacement components and will provide ongoing support.

How to File a Claim or Get Support

To initiate a warranty claim or get assistance, please email us at support@outexer.com with the following:

  1. Your order number or proof of purchase
  2. A detailed description of the issue
  3. Photos or videos (if applicable)

Our team aims to respond within 24–48 hours and will guide you through the next steps.

Our Promise

Outexer is committed to providing quality, healthy and long-term satisfaction. Whether you choose a sauna for the first time or return after many years, we are happy to provide you with a healthy and relaxing journey.
